mapper.insert: insert into ecs_ecsmart_article_cat (cat_id, cat_name, cat_type, keywords, cat_desc, sort_order, show_in_nav, parent_id) values (#{cat_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{cat_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cat_type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cat_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort_order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{show_in_nav,jdbcType=BIT}, #{parent_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT})

mapper.select: select cat_id, cat_name, cat_type, keywords, cat_desc, sort_order, show_in_nav, parent_id from ecs_ecsmart_article_cat
